name: Budget Constraints
description: The prospect indicated that the project or purchase could not proceed due to budgetary limitations.

name: Chose Competitor
description: The prospect has decided to go with a solution offered by a competitor.

name: No Response
description: Multiple attempts to contact the prospect have yielded no response.

name: Project Postponed
description: The prospect's project or initiative for which our solution was considered has been delayed or put on hold indefinitely.

name: Not a Fit
description: After evaluation, it was determined that our solution does not meet the prospect's specific needs or requirements.

name: Lost to Partner
description: The deal was lost because the prospect chose to work with one of our partners who may offer a broader package or a more specialized local service.
